msContents.summary: Ff. i r-ii v(erso): Praise of the Beloved in Honor of Saint George, ስብሐተ፡ ፍቁር፡. Répertoire 229, written in an untrained hand of the 20th century. Ff. 1r-67v: A collecton of Works on John the Baptist and Repentance, arranged for the days of the week: Tuesday (10v), Wednesday (20v), Thursday (29r), Friday (37v), Saturday (46r), Sunday (58r). Ff. 1r-10r: A discourse of John Chrysostom in commemoration of S. John the Baptist, on Mathew 11:9. Incipit: ድርሳን ዘደረስ ቅዱስ ወብፁዕ ዮሐን[ስ] አፈ ወርቅ ሊቀ ጳጳሳት ዘሀገረ ቁስጥንጥንያ ዘተናገረ በእንተ ዮሐንስ መጥምቅ በከመ ጽሑፍ በወንጌለ ማታዎስ ዘይብል. . . . See Wright, CCXCIII (Or717), 2. Ff. 10v-67v. The Acts of S. John the Baptist, a discourse ascribed to John Chrysostom. Incipit: በስመ አብ . . . በእንተ ዮሐንስ መጥምቅ በዓለ ክርስትና ወዘከመ ከነምትረቱ። ወተርጎም ቅዱስ ዮሐንስ አፈ ወርቅ ወልሳነ ወርቅ በትረያሬክ ወዝውእቱ። ብሂል ሊቀ ጳጳሳት እሀገረ ቁስጥንጥንያ ወሶበ ኮነ ውስተ ተስዶቱ ውኢተ ጊዜ አብራኪስ አመ ተስእሉቱ አይሁዳዊ ኪልቂዶናዊ ዘአምነ በእግዚአብሔር በእንተ ረሱ ንጽሕት ዘዮሐንስ በዓለ ክርስትና ወዜነው ንስቲተ እምሕይወቱ ትጋቢዖ ቀረበ ተርጎም በስላመ እግዚአብሔር አሜን. See Wright CCXCIII (OR717), 1. Ff. 10v-21v: Secton One. Ff. 21v-29r: Section Two. Ff. 29r-37v: Section Three. Ff. 37v-46r: Section Four. Ff. 46r-58r: Section Five. Ff. 58r-67v: Section Six. Ff. 68r-74r: Book of confession, Mäṣǝḥäfä Nuzaze, መጽሐፈ፡ ኑዛዜ፡. Cf. EMML 1334.8 (IV, 368); EMIP 187, written in a different hand of the early 20th century. Ff. 74v-84v: A theological work on the creation, akin to Beauty of creation, ሥነ፡ ፍጥረት።, but in an abbreviated form, and including a summary of faith. Ff. 84v-85v: Prayer for Departed Souls. Notes. F. 10r and passim mention the owner, ወልደ ታክለ ሃይማኖት. F. 67v contains a note of ownership by the same person. F. 74r mentions the scribe of the second part of the book, ሕፃንሞአ.
